item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 1, 2024 at 1:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. ESO telescope captures the most detailed infrared map of the Milky Way (96 points | 10 comments)
2. YC criticized for backing AI startup that simply cloned another AI startup (123 points | 56 comments)
3. Boris Vallejo and the pixel art of the demoscene (354 points | 91 comments)
4. Bop Spotter (2139 points | 350 comments)
5. East and Gulf Coast ports strike (33 points | 26 comments)
6. "Comedy is search" – theory on how jokes work (113 points | 75 comments)
7. Ask HN: Should you reply STOP to unwanted texts? (145 points | 166 comments)
8. Show HN: qrframe – generate beautiful qr codes with javascript code (299 points | 46 comments)
9. NewsCatcher News API (YC S22) Is Hiring ( | hide)
10. Sea robins use leg-like fins to taste, navigate seafloor, researchers discover (16 points | 1 comment)
11. What the Photographer Who's Taken Philosopher Portraits Thinks of Philosophers (13 points | discuss)
12. Essential node in global semiconductor supply chain hit by Hurricane Helene (136 points | 37 comments)
13. PyTorch Native Architecture Optimization: Torchao (131 points | 37 comments)
14. MusicBrainz: An open music encyclopedia (362 points | 81 comments)
15. Show HN: Facad – A colorful directory listing tool for the command line (120 points | 77 comments)
16. Pear AI founder: We made two big mistakes (124 points | 133 comments)
17. Show HN: Venator – Open-source threat detection (63 points | discuss)
18. Ask HN: What is the best way to learn Erlang? (35 points | 23 comments)
19. Vanishing Culture: Preserving Cookbooks (110 points | 72 comments)
20. Launch HN: Inkeep (YC W23) – Copilot for Support (think Cursor for help desks) (112 points | 56 comments)
21. The Case of the Missing Increment (43 points | 12 comments)
22. Phrase matching in Marginalia Search (172 points | 21 comments)
23. California bans legacy admissions at private universities (493 points | 519 comments)
24. Show HN: A macOS app to prevent sound quality degradation on AirPods (184 points | 259 comments)
25. Do AI companies work? (373 points | 395 comments)
26. BorgBackup 2.0 supports Rclone – over 70 cloud providers in addition to SSH (219 points | 70 comments)
27. Ask HN: Any good essays/books/advice about software sales? (195 points | 76 comments)
28. I Don't Have LinkedIn (19 points | 10 comments)
29. Keep Track: 3D Satellite Toolkit (166 points | 36 comments)
30. AI chipmaker Cerebras files for IPO (198 points | 107 comments)
